text: Toto IV is the fourth studio album by American rock band Toto and was released on March 26, 1982 through Columbia Records. It topped the album charts in Australia, Canada and the Netherlands. It went to the top 10 in Japan, New Zealand, Norway, the United Kingdom and the United States. It won for 2 Grammy Awards in 1983. == Track listing == == References == Category:1982 albums Category:Toto (band) albums
title: Toto IV
